#summary Unit types for Select events

= Introduction =
This page present *Unit type* codes used in Select events.

Those codes are located in the middle of the Select event, after the deselection stuff and before the units IDs.

See GameEventsSelect for more details.

<br/><br/>
= Codes =

This list is about 54% complete but the remaining 46% are either very uncommon units (like Raven spawns) or simply useless (Doodads, Neutral animals, and so on). So the current list covers a huge majority of the needs.
